Dear all,

I've got a problem to make new gas on fortran.

I use :
* Chemic=
al kinetic mechanism, Thermodynamic parameters and Transport
paramters of i=
so-Octane
(http://www-cms.llnl.gov/combustion/combustion2.html#i-C8H18).
* =
the demo file of fortran 77 (installing with cantera). Consequently,
to mak=
e a file .xml I wrote :
call newIdealGasMix('ic8_2e_mech.inp', 'ic8_2c_ther=
m.dat',
'ic8_2c_tran.dat')

The result is :
_______________________________=
_______________________________________
Traceback (most recent call last):
=
  File "./.cttmp1138696364.pyw", line 7, in ?
    execfile(file)
  File "/u=
sr/local/cantera/1.6.0/data/ic8_2e_mech.inp", line 1
    ! Curran, H. J., G=
affuri, P., Pitz, W. J., and Westbrook, C. K.
    ^
SyntaxError: invalid sy=
ntax



************************************************

 Cantera Error!
************************************************


Procedur=
e: ct2ctml
Error:     could not convert input file to CTML.
 Command line w=
as:
sleep 1; python ./.cttmp1138696364.pyw &> ct2ctml.log
_________________=
_____________________________________________________

If somebody can reso=
lve this problem, I will be happy.


I've got another problem. In the demo =
file demo.f of fortran 77, I
replace the line :
 call newIdealGasMix('h2o2.=
cti','ohmech','Mix')
by
 call newIdealGasMix('air.cti','ohmech','Mix'),
for=
 exemple. 
And, the result is :
"segmentation fault".
I think, there is a b=
ad definition of pointer in cpp, but I not
understand what I do.

Thank you=
, for your help.

Alberto.
